Articles.Content:
No longer a work in progress, I give you the real thing:

**Nova Class Starship** 

Specifically the Nova Class refit featured in Voyager : Endgame. The USS Rhode Island, captained by Harry Kim!

![vtqrT0J.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vtqrT0J.jpg)

683 parts. 131.8 tons. Crew capacity - 105. Possibly about a quarter scale of the TV show version depending on whether you go by length or height.

![WWwvQlu.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/WWwvQlu.jpg)

![Vb038oG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Vb038oG.jpg)

![FAoUacg.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/FAoUacg.jpg)

The schematic I worked from:

![novavariant15.jpg](https://trekazoid.files.wordpress.com/2010/12/novavariant15.jpg)

![knf4J2E.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/knf4J2E.jpg)

![Xaq5Zmc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Xaq5Zmc.jpg)

![BDGKumd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BDGKumd.jpg)

If you want to fly it, you can. It's recommended you zoom into the ship and select the control ring at its centre. You will have to use Infinite Fuel if you want to fly it anywhere, unless you want to fill it with fuel and hook up a ton of fuel lines yourself! It does have SAS, vernor thrusters and 2 small engines inside the tips of the saucer section. Oh and you'll have to hyper-edit it into orbit.

Hotkey 1 - Toggles exterior lighting

Hotkey 2 - Toggles cabin lights

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/fXPF3)

[Download here!](http://www./download/z5fsd46566ssqvi/Nova_Class_Starship.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-27T18:05:47Z" title="02/27/2015 06:05  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 27, 2015</time> by Redshift OTF**
That's... that's damn impressive. Seriously, good job!
Its nice to see a very well designed star trek ship, great work.
Gods bless the gizmos, right? Have a rep, all of it.

Frakking brilliant, man (or woman?)!!

Love it!

Would you like to sit down for a chat and build **The Ultimate Constitution Refit** with me? 305 meters. I was building one last summer ... might be interesting to create one from scratch once the hangar size limits are lifted, with all the new possibilities the new editor gives us.

![WgjQ03V.png](http://i.imgur.com/WgjQ03V.png)

![h1XKGet.png](http://i.imgur.com/h1XKGet.png)

![lh9IMbr.png](http://i.imgur.com/lh9IMbr.png)

And damn ... still can't give you more rep!

Thanks for the positive comments! Yes, without the new Gizmos this would have been impossible.

Azimech, amazing Constitution refit. After this build I'm probably going to have a rest and just build smaller things for fun! Besides, I think the part count might get on the silly side if I built another Trek ship bigger or more to scale. It would be nice to get my Chinook to fly better, lol. I still haven't posted that yet.
This is so good. Amazingly executed.
Rep rep rep rep rep rep rep rep rep rep.....

Repitty rep rep! SSI is salivating and asking for permission to list this jaw dropping thread in our catalog. pretty please?

This thread has epic written all over it.

> 
> Repitty rep rep! SSI is salivating and asking for permission to list this jaw dropping thread in our catalog. pretty please?
> This thread has epic written all over it.

Wow, thank you. List it by all means!
Can I just kinda... Weld the entire thing? Let me try...

OMG it even has an inside - I was expecting a solid lump of fuel tanks, not a warp core! Now if only there was a way to EVA into it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Stellar work!
i really like your design and i would like to fly it, but the download link doesn't work. have you got any solutions???
sadly, i can like this only once!
